title: HEx: A heterologous expression platform for the discovery of fungal natural products.
description: Colin J. B. Harvey, Mancheng Tang, Ulrich Schlecht, Joe Horecka, Curt R. Fischer, Hsiao-Ching Lin, Jian Li, Brian Naughton, James Cherry, Molly Miranda, Yong Fuga Li, Angela M. Chu, James R. Hennessy, Gergana A. Vandova, Diane Inglis, Raeka S. Aiyar, Lars M. Steinmetz, Ronald W. Davis, Marnix H. Medema, Elizabeth Sattely, Chaitan Khosla, Robert P. St. Onge, Yi Tang, and Maureen E. Hillenmeyer.
